alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 1:09PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Minnesota, including the following county, Koochiching. * WHEN...Until 100 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 106 PM CDT, A National Weather Service employee reported flooding is occurring near the mouths of the Littlefork and Black Rivers. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Birchdale, Littlefork, Manitou, Loman, Pelland, Franz Jevne State Park and Indus. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
